content.question: ​The functions <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> are given by <math alttext="f open parentheses theta close parentheses equals 2 cos theta"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g open parentheses theta close parentheses equals 2 cos open parentheses b theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>b</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="b"><semantics><mi>b</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is a constant. If the period of <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is half the period of <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, then solving which of the following equations will give the correct value of <math alttext="b"><semantics><mi>b</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​​<math alttext="fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator b end fraction equals 1 half"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mi>b</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator b end fraction equals 1 half open parentheses 2 pi close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mi>b</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​<math alttext="fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator b end fraction equals 2 pi"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mi>b</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator b end fraction equals 2 open parentheses 2 pi close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mi>b</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator b end fraction equals 1 half open parentheses 2 pi close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mi>b</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
